title: Field Report: Castello di Potentino
subtitle: Field Report: Castello di Potentino
summary: From time to time we get in a story that’s deserves a bit more attention to than we are able give in our regular monthly episode. And here one of those. A field report from Farmeramra reporter Camilla Williamson at Castello di Potentino, a small-scale sustainable vineyard in Italy.
